website_summaries.verdict: Keep your socks clean with this ladder that allows you to sit on the edge of the trampoline and put your shoes in elevated storage pockets.
pros: Gives you two pockets for shoe storage while jumping
Includes a pad on the top to help ease the wear and tear on the trampoline springs and pad
Rounded hooks at the top will fit on most standard trampolines
Wide steps are easy to climb
cons: No way for this ladder to be secured to the trampoline, which can be convenient for moving, but makes it a bit wobbly

customer_reviews.title: Should be included with the trampoline. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: We used the trampoline for a year without a ladder... save yourself the headache and stolen step ladder/deck chairs, just buy the ladder. Now kids can get in and out easy. I doubt they'll use the bags for shoes but the mat on top is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jingles

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was gonna build a little wooden step for the kids to use but when I saw this product I figured it would save me plenty of time and money and I wasn't disappointed. Assembles in 15 minutes and works great! Shoe holder is nice too. I drop my phone, wallet keys in there before I get on and it keeps my stuff safe. A must have for any trampoline owner. Should work with most any trampoline.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Russell

customer_reviews.title: Not really happy with this Trampoline accessory kit
customer_reviews.text: Not really happy with this ladder and accessory kit. I would have returned it, but it would have cost more than what I spent, so we are keeping it. The ladder really needs a handrail to be truely useful. Also the ladder is too long for our 10ft Skywalker Trampoline as such it really sticks out. The "door mat" should have more tie-downs as there are no tie-downs where the safety net opens, thus there is a good chance that you will catch your foot when coming out and possibly trip
customer_reviews.author: JimC

customer_reviews.title: A perfect solution for ripped seams!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: STILL in Great condition as of Dec 2019. Still holding up and seems even tougher lasting then the original material that covers the springs on the trampoline. Really Happy with this product! I just got this and put it together. So happy with it. So easy to assemble. Nice and snug. It covers over the spot where the seam tore at the door to the trampoline. The shoe bags are great for little ones who typically throw them down on the ground. And my 2yr old was even confident climbing up on her own. Yay! This saved us money from spending on buying and whole new bumper for the entire thing to cover all the springs. Worth the $30+!
customer_reviews.author: barn03

customer_reviews.title: This is for a round newer-model trampoline
customer_reviews.text: This ladder and accessories is fine. I was a little disappointed, because it is definitely made for a round trampoline, and mine is square. Also, I had to put bricks under the ladder for it to reach and be steady. I have an older model Skywalker, so I thought this would work with no problem. Maybe they don’t make trampolines like they did before. Not sure. I’m keeping it, because it serves its purpose, and I’m not going to make my kids wait for a different one. It just doesn’t fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Provides easier access to the trampoline, effective shoe storage, protects the spring pad over the entrance from extra wear. It does those jobs. The ladder itself isn't bolted on so you can remove it if you have to, say, clean the steps under a hose but while installed and with the cover in place it's pretty solid, not going anywhere. And my wife tends to be assembly-challenged; every time she gets impatient waiting for me and tries to assemble something herself she ends up screwing it up and I have to go back and fix it. But this one she actually did correctly herself. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kronin323Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble a fits perfectly on our trampoline. Sturdy and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Simonsen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect height. My 5 and 7 year old have ...
customer_reviews.text: Assembled within minutes. Perfect height. My 5 and 7 year old have no problem with the distance between the steps. The only thing is the screws on the front are sharp. Once I tightened them it begins to strip easily and the metal has sharp edges. I just used a nail file and filed around it and doubled checked by running my hand along the screws to make sure it wouldn't snag/scratch anyone/thing. But this is something that can happen with anything that requires assembly! So happy I found this, price was great, assembly was a snap, I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Happy camper

customer_reviews.title: Measure first!
customer_reviews.text: So overall this ladder is decent. It’s my fault that I didn’t pay enough attention to the size, when it arrived I put it together and realized it was way to short for our trampoline. I really just assumed these things were somewhat universal. Since it’s such a hassle to return my husband ended up building a step for it to sit on so our kids climb the ladder. Overall the ladder is fine- just make sure you measure first!!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Sheehy

customer_reviews.title: Best ladder on market for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very easy assembly! Less than ten minutes Purchased for 14ft trampoline and is universal for all trampolines My second purchase and the first is two plus years old and looks new Very sturdy and will heavier water persons Holder for shoes is included and will not only hold shoes but will keep entrance padding from wear and tear
customer_reviews.author: Henry Mcclary Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good little step ladder for your trampoline
customer_reviews.text: Good little step ladder for your trampoline. There's not much else to say about it - seems sturdy, made of aluminum so it'll withstand the elements. The only thing I don't care for is that there isn't really a way to solidly mount the thing to the trampoline frame, so it can rock a bit when climbing/dismounting.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hadden

customer_reviews.title: This is easy to set up and install
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to set up and install. The vinyl flap is separate from the ladder and man did we need it. Just our entrance into the trampoline was torn, so I didn't want to go through the cost and mainly hassles of replacing the entire pad. The ladder steps are a little far apart for my almost 2 year old, but he seems to manage! The rest of my crew are just fine (next age is 4). The pockets to hold things are also a great idea.
customer_reviews.author: Agwife

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, for a day.
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars for the ladder, zero for the mat. Ladder is a must have and the wide steps are a plus. The bags on the mat were wonderful, for the one day we could use it. Then the tie ripped off of one side. I am going to alter it so we can hang it up to the side. Perfect for my daughter to store her glasses when jumping.
customer_reviews.author: E. Maurer

customer_reviews.title: Best addition to your standard trampoline
customer_reviews.text: These slabs are amazing, wider than most steps I looked into and the two pockets are awesome, I wish I didn’t wait so long to order this. Much easier to get on and off the trampoline especially for parents :) The side pockets make great phone holders or water bottle holders In addition to holding shoes
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: safe attached ladder
customer_reviews.text: This ladder was easy to assemble and easy to connect to the trampoline. Our 3 year old can easily go up and down with no problems, it is tricky for our 1.5 year old as the steps are further apart than his legs are long. Not sure of the recommended ages but I would recommend for 3+ aged kiddos.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: No problems here. Ladder is so sturdy and safe (even for my 3 y/o). Love the shoe holder and the blue plastic part on top is great for them to sit on to remove and replace shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for a trampoline
customer_reviews.text: The ladder is a great quality product. I love the wide steps since the kids are rushing to get in the trampoline. The mat is thick and durable. It attaches with straps you tie to the trampoline frame. The pouches are very useful...shoes, water bottles, toys, etc... I'm very glad I bought this. I would not hesitate to recommend this to anyone.,
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Baker

customer_reviews.title: Works great, shoe bag is a bonus!
customer_reviews.text: I got this because it came with the shoe bags and I really like it! It can hold about 4 pairs of kid shoes, which is fine for us because we don't let more than 4 kids jump at a time anyway. The ladder is plenty wide enough steps for the kids to climb up easily, and detaches easily for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy A Pettersen

customer_reviews.title: A nice ladder
customer_reviews.text: This was a good purchase for the trampoline. The kids needed something to boost them up and this is a nice little ladder. The storage bags aren’t that great as they are pretty small. You can barely fit a pair of tiny shoes in there. The kids quit using it after a while. If they had a cheaper version without the bags then I would go that route but overall it’s worth the ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoe bag is worthless, the ladder works great
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 5 stars if it was just the ladder. The ladder works great and we have no issues with it. The shoe bag on the other hand, is totally worthless. We have not been able to use it, because some of the mounting ties were missing.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: It works for the price in comparison to the price of others out there. The top piece and the shoe holder don't stay and don't seem to fit correctly. My son says the ladder is awfully "wabbly" but they can at least get up and down.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Works well but takes a bit of time to setup
customer_reviews.text: The steps are plastic, so we'll have to see how they stand up to prolonged use. The straps for attaching the door mat/storage bags to the trampoline are not intuitive--I had to reattach them a few times to get it all to sit right.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient for the kids to just climb up on their own and the bags seem to be made of decent quality. I'm sure like all things on a trampoline they'll wear out but the ladder is very good quality and seems like it's made to last. The steps are made of plastic I was a bit disappointed in that but overall it's a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder
customer_reviews.text: The ladder is awesome and easy to assemble. The pad is a great concept, but is a little bunchy no matter how much I try to flatten it. Still a nice product to help us get through another season with our deteriorating pad though, and the price is good.
customer_reviews.author: mleigh

customer_reviews.title: Confusing
customer_reviews.text: I never figured out how to get this in correctly, and believe me I tried, I finally got it half decent but then it started falling off, quality was so so not horrible, instructions were confusing to say the least
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Great accessory for my Skywalker Trampoline.
customer_reviews.text: Liked this accessory set for my Skywalker Trampoline. I don't know why they don't just increase the price for the trampoline and include this set. The ladder steps are wide enough for smaller kids to stand on.
customer_reviews.author: Rich from Idaho

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have, could be better priced (or even better included with the trampoline)
customer_reviews.text: I'm gonna be honest, you don't need to have this. You can solve this by putting any stool or box to help kids get on. We don't use the "Accesory" because it doesn't match our trampoline color.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Bel

customer_reviews.title: Best ladder to complement the tranpoline.
customer_reviews.text: Works super well with the skywalker trampoline we were gifted. The kids liked the extra wide steps vs the other ladder available to purchase. The bags are great to put shoes and socks in.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Cheung

customer_reviews.title: Ladder is good storage part is useless
customer_reviews.text: The latter works fine and is very handy. The problem is the other piece that supposed to hold shoes and stuff broke within 20 minutes of installing it.
customer_reviews.author: USA Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Customer support is nonexistent from Skywalker.
customer_reviews.text: The ladder works great. However the shoe bag is sewn wrong in our kit. One pouch opens up to the exterior of the trampoline as it should but the other opens up to the underside of the trampoline. We called Skywalker as the paperwork says to do. They had us take pictures of everything including the original box. Once we have them everything they asked for their replay was basically “We can’t help you. Return to amazon and reorder”. Nope, not going to reorder anything from Skywalker after that response.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben

customer_reviews.title: A must have!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you have the Skywalker Trampoline then you need too and have too get this as well. Very dangerous for anyone and especially the kids when the are exiting or entering. Looks great and holds up great
customer_reviews.author: james donaldson

customer_reviews.title: a must have for your trampoline!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Nice wide stairs that won't hurt bare feet or burn them since their plastic. Pouch for shoes conveniently located! I got this for my daughter who has balance issues & she can go up and down with ease, confidence and independence!
customer_reviews.author: Janna Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This was the only ladder that worked for our trampoline (a sky walker) because they diameter is so much bigger than a standard tramp. It works great and has held up great. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Questionable for age
customer_reviews.text: I have a 3 year old and 5 year old the steps are too wide apart . My 5 year old can make it but it makes me uneasy . It was easy to assemble , made great , I like the shoe holders easy to attach. Definitely would recommend .
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: More visually appealing than using a step ladder. Each rung is quite narrow so that took my kids some getting used to but they like it now. I love the spot for shoes because my dog has a bad habit of stealing shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Mom

customer_reviews.title: I tried to be cheap and forego a trampoline ladder. So glad I caved and bought this!
customer_reviews.text: After two weeks without a ladder for our new trampoline I gave in and so glad I did. Put together in minutes, sturdy, and makes it so much easier (and safer in my opinion) for little ones to get in and out of a trampoline.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Z.

customer_reviews.title: A must have accessory
customer_reviews.text: Nice accessory to add to your trampoline. Makes it easier to get in and out and has a couple of netted bags to hold shoes...
customer_reviews.author: Z. Fistes

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with this!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with this purchase. Works great with our trampoline, kids have no problem going up and down it.
customer_reviews.author: SuperMom2011

customer_reviews.title: Safety and value.. Let the fun begin..
customer_reviews.text: It arrived undamaged. It took less than five min to assemble. Quality is great. And best of all, it fits. Easy to get in and out of trampoline now. Shoe holder is a plus. Wife and son love it.
customer_reviews.author: Wualdisa lopez

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for any trampoline owner
customer_reviews.text: This is a lifesaver. I should have bought this years ago. It is so much easier to get on the trampoline and even has a place for shoes. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: AF

customer_reviews.title: Very handy product
customer_reviews.text: Know my grandson have somewhere to put his shoes and items. The latter is a must have works very well a safe product to help navigate into the trampoline.
customer_reviews.author: Vannetta Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Check the height of your tramp...
customer_reviews.text: Does a decent job to get on the tramp... but it's a little long for my tramp. What happens is that the steps (the black plastic parts) are slightly angled forward, causing the step to not be flat. This makes it uncomfortable climbing the ladder in bare feet since the main contact with your feet are on the edge/corner. If there where a way to make the ladder slightly shorter, i could avoid this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas D

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, spread apart steps makes it hard for kids.
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to set up and put on. My only complaint is that I wish there were more steps on the ladder. I have a 4 & 5 year old and the steps are pretty wide apart, so they really have to stretch their legs to get to the next step. Other than that, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda W.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: My daughter requested this and it's perfect. The bags are a good size too. It's mostly teens who use our trampoline and they need full size bags for their shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Always Learning

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ladder!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping as always thanks to Prime. Extremely easy to put together. I finished with 15 minutes. All the tools you need come with it. I ordered this one specifically for the mat at the top because our spring over is kind of ripping in that area. My boys are so happy they no longer have to use a lawn chair to get on their trampoline.
customer_reviews.author: BulldogMama

customer_reviews.title: Its spacious and good
customer_reviews.text: After trying to guess 5 mins how it goes u can figure it out with out even looking at the manual. Of course with my 5 mins of guessing I still looked at the manual 3 or 4 times..the shoe slots look sorta big for maybe 2 pairs each.....so that's a bonus
customer_reviews.author: Taste tester

customer_reviews.title: Item as described
customer_reviews.text: Slightly flimsy for the cost but not a bad item. It’s a must have for people that have kids and dogs lol. Our dog steals shoes when the kids jump on the trampoline. Now he can’t reach them
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany M.

customer_reviews.title: Great accessory
customer_reviews.text: Pretty straight forward as far as putting it together. The kids really appreciated having a safer way to get in/out of the trampoline's enclosure. Would highly recommend to buy with the trampoline (order at same time).
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Safford

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, great value and high quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and value for the money. Durable design. Easy assemble and install with simple instructions! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Definitely needed this for the 15' square trampoline we got, my kids would not have been able to get up on it without this.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Easy Setup
customer_reviews.text: This is great for storing all the shoes and socks that are usually thrown on the ground. It’s sturdy and was quick to attach.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Best trampoline steps
customer_reviews.text: These steps are so comfortable barefoot. My 20month old son steps up and down these with ease. On the plus side it comes with storage.
customer_reviews.author: Heather S.

customer_reviews.title: A must for your trampoline
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect accessory for the kids to get in and out of the trampoline and the pouches on the side are great so no shoes are left on the ground
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Over all great just ask my 4 yr old
customer_reviews.text: The ladder is great and easy to install the shoe holder sucks to install and the directions for the shoe holder suck to
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Walton

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy to put on and set up. Makes it easy for the kids to get on and off and keeps shoes close at hand.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, great trampoline!
customer_reviews.text: My husband watched a video on how to assemble this and had no trouble putting it together by himself in 2-3 hrs. My kids love it. Very quality trampoline.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Stansbury

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for the kids.
customer_reviews.text: This ladder is awesome, and safe! Accommodates my 10-year-old and all the way down to my 3 year old. They get on and off with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Cel

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have a four year old grand daughter who could not get in the trampoline by herself. Now she feels like a big girl!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Just got our trampoline from Skywalker so we needed the ladder. So easy to assemble, love the wide steps for my 3 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and easy to put together, I didn't even have to make my husband dot it! I like that the steps are wider and don't hurt bare feet. The pockets hold shoes and the foam basketballs nicely.
customer_reviews.author: jen3

customer_reviews.title: This is working great on our tramp
customer_reviews.text: This is working great on our tramp. The pockets are nice when my kids remember to use them. Ladder is easy to assemble and all my kids can use it easily. I have a 4 yr old, 7, and 9 yr old using it right now.
customer_reviews.author: CouCono

customer_reviews.title: Well made, but steps are too far apart!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product is fine, and the shoe bags are a nice feature... my main issue is that there are only two steps and they're too far apart. My 3yr old can barely make it up the steps because they're just too far apart.
customer_reviews.author: T. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Trampoline ladder
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's supposed to and looks good while doing it. Was easy to assemble and install. We like that the incline angle is relatively shallow (more like steep stairs than a ladder) which makes it easier for kids to get on and off.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Belac

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to your trampoline
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to any trampoline kids loved it eazy climb in climb out loved the side shoe bags and easy set up worth buying
customer_reviews.author: Icornejo

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Pocket nets came backwards, very bad quality. The ladder on the other hand was good
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Much needed!
customer_reviews.text: Much needed! They work great and I love that they came with the nets for the shoes. Great buy and easy to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra Ludwig

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our new trampoline
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly underneath the mat and gives us a place to store shoes so the dog doesn't get them.
customer_reviews.author: Hardin Management & Consulting

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and perfect addition to our trampoline
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and perfect addition to our trampoline. We've had our trampoline over a year and the kids would either climb in by hoisting their legs up on one side of the trampoline or grab a lawn chair to do so. Those days are over!
customer_reviews.author: Inniac Yaj

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: A little thought for the little ones to use. Wish it had a 3rd step. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t seem the sturdiest but it works great for my son to put his shoes in and the dogs not get them also he can get in without ya having to leave a chair by the trampoline
customer_reviews.author: Grace P.

customer_reviews.title: The holy grale
customer_reviews.text: Honestly why does this product not come with the actual trampoline. It’s been a game changer! I swear by this tramping ladder it’s effing brilliant and I can’t believe they’re not more popular! 5 stars over and over again
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Trampoline step
customer_reviews.text: Product seems to be good quality. Time will tell how long it last outside
customer_reviews.author: Chino

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Easy assembly. The kids love it and it is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Angela P.

customer_reviews.title: Love having the pockets so we know where the shoes ...
customer_reviews.text: Love having the pockets so we know where the shoes are and the extra pad heals with the wear at the entrance. Nice and think material not cheap!
customer_reviews.author: love my kindle books

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed. Its sturdy & I love the mesh begs for the kids to put their water bottles or shoes in. It was super easy to put it together. My 11 yr old son did it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea T.

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Easy to assemble. Very sturdy and simple to set up. Only suggestion is to make it a couple inches shorter to not be so angled.
customer_reviews.author: MDC Jr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Took me less than 5 minutes to put together. Very helpful for our toddler son when he wants to get on trampoline he doesn’t have to ask us for help!
customer_reviews.author: Jess Owens

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder only
customer_reviews.text: The ladder is great but the bags are stupid and useless- they don’t hang straight
customer_reviews.author: Kathy J. Romo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Keeps shoes and phones organized and off the ground. Children love that!
customer_reviews.author: Giles King

customer_reviews.title: Great Ladder
customer_reviews.text: The ladder is very good. Steady and sturdy for both a small child and also an adult. The shoe holder is so-so. It attaches oddly but does do what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: RIRedd

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together! Fits our trampoline perfectly. It is just the perfect width for my younger 3yo to get on and off safely too. The nat helps protect the entrance area too! Love that!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Pfau

customer_reviews.title: Must have for trampolines
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why I haven't purchased this before now!!! It's easy and works better then anything I have bought!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mommyjox4

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for damaged spring cover
customer_reviews.text: Covers cost $60+, so this was a great deal to make the entry safe and even has holders for stuff, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Colby M. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly on my 15 feet trampoline
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and looks solid. My kids are super happy now that they can get to the Trampoline so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Mansoor Nazar

customer_reviews.title: Yes it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad I purchased this for my trampoline. It made climbing in and out a lot easier for us all.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to our trampoline. Better than giving up an outdoor chair for the entire summer!!
customer_reviews.author: devlin57064

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Works great with our 12 foot sky walker trampoline. Installed in minutes.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. I’ve been putting chairs for the kinds to get into the trampoline, and they broke every one this ladder works great and the bags are perfect to put their shoes in.
customer_reviews.author: amazonpal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a way for my little boy to get on the trampoline easily since he’s so small for his age and this works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Kids love having an easy way onto the trampoline
customer_reviews.text: Kids LOVE this ladder and especially like the bag as that hold their shoes so our little dog doesn't run away with them.
customer_reviews.author: MomOf3TKL

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money sturdy and made it very easy for my kids to ...
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money sturdy and made it very easy for my kids to get in, even my five year old!!
customer_reviews.author: indianaranger

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install, holds everything it's supposed to and more. The steps are perfect and easy to remove when I have to move the trampoline.
customer_reviews.author: Mborden

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to trampoline. Makes it easy for smaller kids
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Aguilera

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for our trampoline. Wish the rubber on the bottom didn’t split open right after we got it. But great ladder!
customer_reviews.author: savvyshopper

customer_reviews.title: ... 18 month old by can use these stairs just fine. It took him a couple tries to figure ...
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old by can use these stairs just fine. It took him a couple tries to figure it out, but this is great for letting kids get on and off a trampoline themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S

customer_reviews.title: Received in perfect condition. It was perfect for the trampoline for ...
customer_reviews.text: Received in perfect condition. It was perfect for the trampoline for my granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: BeBe

customer_reviews.title: Okay ladder.
customer_reviews.text: No instructions. Bottomed support screws too big/long. Hard to get steps on bars. Okay once I figured it out.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and very sturdy. We were using a step stool before and this made it way easier and has a spot to keep the shoes
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Ladder.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect ladder for the Skywalker Trampoline. Easy to assemble and holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: Damian Greene

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder and we LOVE the nets for shoes!
customer_reviews.text: This ladder is very sturdy. Not hard to assemble. Our dog loves to take any abandoned shoes and run around with them so we love the nets on each side. Each net fits about 3 pairs of shoes. We are on our 3rd month with this product and it looks brand new still. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

product_meta.title: Skywalker Trampolines Wide-Step Ladder Accessory Kit
product_meta.description: The Skywalker Trampolines Wide Step Ladder Accessory Kit has everything you need for your trampoline. It includesour wide step trampoline ladder and a storage bag. The trampoline ladder is made of weather resistant galvanized steel, and easily hooks onto your trampoline for quick installation. Extra wide textured rungs prevent slipping, keeping your children safe. The door mat helps prevent wear and tear on the spring pad while the storage bag conveniently holds your shoes and other loose articles while you jump.
feature_bullets: FITS: Fits trampoline rails up to 4 Inches in diameter. Easy to install
MATERIALS: Ladder made of rust resistant galvanized steel
FEATURES: 2 extra wide textured foot steps and storage bag that easily attaches to the main frame underneath the spring pad
